data.title: Robert Moery
data.meta_description: Robert was born and raised in Carlisle, Arkansas and is a graduate of the University of Arkansas – Fayetteville. He began his career working for United States Senator John Boozman before going to work as then-candidate Asa Hutchinson’s personal aide for the 2014 gubernatorial election.   Robert served in various roles throughout the Hutchinson administration, including the governor’s liaison to the Division of Rural Services.  In 2018, Robert led the successful re-election campaign for Governor Hutchinson. He now is the Owner and Principal of Broadview Strategies, a full-service government relations and legislative consulting practice based in Little Rock.  Robert is also involved in real estate brokerage focused on farm, timber, and recreational land. He serves on the boards of the Arkansas Good Roads Foundation, and the Arkansas Livestock Show Association. Robert and his wife, Sara Cate Moery have a daughter Mary Trent.
data.text:
Robert was born and raised in Carlisle, Arkansas and is a graduate of the University of Arkansas – Fayetteville. He began his career working for United States Senator John Boozman before going to work as then-candidate Asa Hutchinson’s personal aide for the 2014 gubernatorial election.

Robert served in various roles throughout the Hutchinson administration, including the governor’s liaison to the Division of Rural Services. In 2018, Robert led the successful re-election campaign for Governor Hutchinson. He now is the Owner and Principal of Broadview Strategies, a full-service government relations and legislative consulting practice based in Little Rock. Robert is also involved in real estate brokerage focused on farm, timber, and recreational land.

He serves on the boards of the Arkansas Good Roads Foundation, and the Arkansas Livestock Show Association. Robert and his wife, Sara Cate Moery have a daughter Mary Trent.
